column4: my resolution wont change it's now 1600x1200 and i want it 1280x1024 but it just wont apply
- try and see if your screen res options are in file /etc/X11/xorg.conf - you may be able to apply from there - then reboot
- you need to edit file as super user - ie sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf
- after the file has been changed you can CTRL-ALT-BACKSPACE to restart X
